title: S4 Ep71: On Our Own Accord with Margo Oshry: Monday April 19, 2021
itunes:title: On Our Own Accord with Margo Oshry: Monday April 19, 2021
description:
1. ACM Awards 2021: See who won at the ACM Awards (via CNN)
  2. Taylor Swift’s Re-Recorded ‘Fearless’ Album Debuts at No. 1 on Billboard 200 Chart With Year's Biggest Week (via Billboard)
  3. Demi Lovato calls out LA frozen yogurt shop for selling sugar-free options (via Page Six)
  4. Chris Evans Responds to Lizzo's Drunk DM and Her Reaction Is Perfect (via E! Online)
  5. Kourtney Kardashian's Boyfriend Travis Barker Shares Naughty Birthday Tribute (via E!)
The Morning Toast with Claudia (@girlwithnojob) and Margo Oshry (@margoshry)
Merch: https://shopmorningtoast.com/
The Morning Toast Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/themorningtoast
Girl With No Job by Claudia Oshry: https://www.girlwithnojob.com/book
